steps.title: Basic Controls
steps.description: Master the essential controls: WASD for movement, mouse for aiming, and left click to fire. Use spacebar for emergency brake and shift for boost.

steps.title: Tank Selection
steps.description: Choose your tank based on your playstyle. Light tanks are fast but fragile, heavy tanks are slow but powerful, and medium tanks offer balanced performance.

steps.title: Combat Mechanics
steps.description: Learn to aim for weak spots, manage your ammunition, and use terrain for cover. Remember to repair your tank when damaged.

steps.title: Team Strategy
steps.description: Coordinate with your team, assign roles, and develop tactics. Communication is key to victory in team battles.

steps.title: Resource Management
steps.description: Manage your resources wisely. Collect ammo and repair kits from supply points, and use your boost power strategically.
